data.actual_result: The chat box displays normally, but messages fail to send with a generic error from Clyde
data.expected_result: The email confirmation / 10-minute cooldown/phone confirmation modal is shown and messages can't be sent
data.short_description: Phone verification / 10 minute join cooldown doesn't appear on overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server with a 10 minute cooldown before being able to chat - Attempt to chat in the server using the overlay - Observe
